name: storageRoom
Perc_FAIL: You don't see anything of value
Surv_FAIL: No use for this right now
Arc_FAIL: You don't sense any specific magic
roomDesc: Large musty wooden barrels line the walls of this cave room. Piled atop the barrels or propped beside them are smaller casks of wine and ale. A a small leather book sits on one of the barrels, alongside a small glass vial containing a strange liquid.

SecretRooms.succText: You notices a crease in the northern wall. The wall is hinged and can be opened outward by gripping crevices in the wall as makeshift handles, revealing a secret chamber
